item.description:
An evening of ART and CHOCOLATE!

Join us in the Alchemy Cafe for organic wine and a decadent cacao treat in the raw kitchen. And the Grand Opening of our NEW Art Studio!



Chocolate has amazing complexities and levels of flavor. For centuries, chocolate was not eaten in the bar form we know, but consumed as a drink! To the Mayans, Aztecs and Early-Europeans, this frothy brew made from the cacao bean was a phenomenon of nature. These early chocolate-lovers were likely impressed by chocolate because of its mild stimulant value â€” it made them feel awake, alert, strong. Chocolate quickly gained a reputation as food vital for health.

While savoring the chocolate afterglow of Alchemy's cacao , peruse the latest monthly art exhibit in our cafe featuring local artist-in-residence, Jonathan Frechette. This month, February's theme is Erotica: A Celebration of the Sacred Form.

Grand Opening of our NEW Art Studio!


We have just finished renovating the newly opened art studio space next to the cafe. Come view the space and see some information about our upcoming art classes, including figure drawing with Jonathan. All artists, those who appreciate art & any others welcome to attend!
item.name: Erotic Art Exhibit & Raw Chocolate Tasting
